extension_description.message: Hundzuluxa tsalwa leri hlawuriweke eka tluka ra webu ivi u hundzuluxela eka xivumbeko lexi boxiweke.

turn_off_description.message: Translate button yi ta humelela nkarhi wun’wana na wun’wana loko tsalwa ri hlawuriwa

turn_on_description.message: Batani ya Hundzuluxa a yi nge tikombi loko tsalwa ri hlawuriwile kambe wa ha swi kota ku hundzuluxela hi ku tikhoma xifaniso xa Pro Translate eka barhi ya switirhisiwa

target_language_description.message: Hlawula ririmi leri kongomisiweke eka rona

auto_switch.message: Hi ku tisungulela cincela eka ririmi ra vumbirhi leri kongomisiweke

auto_switch_description.message: Loko tsalwa leri hlawuriweke ri ri ririmi leri kongomisiweke ra ntolovelo, ri hundzuluxele eka ririmi ra vumbirhi leri kongomisiweke

second_target_language_description.message: Hlawula ririmi ra vumbirhi leri kongomisiweke ra xiviri

target_format_description.message: Hlawula xivumbeko xa xikongomelo xa ntolovelo, xivumbeko xi nga cinciwa eka phanele ya vuhundzuluxi

auto_set_format.message: Seta xivumbeko xa xiviri hi ku tisungulela

auto_set_format_description.message: Loko u cinca xivumbeko eka phanele ya vuhundzuluxeri, veka xivumbeko lexi hlawuriweke eka xivumbeko xa ntolovelo

format_and_order.message: Fomati ya phanele ya vuhundzuluxeri na oda

format_and_order_description.message: Fometa timhaka leti nga cinciwaka eka phanele ya vuhundzuluxi na ku landzelelana ka nkombiso

translate_button_on_description.message: Translate button yi ta humelela nkarhi wun’wana na wun’wana loko tsalwa ri hlawuriwa

translate_button_off.message: U nga kombisi buti ya Hundzuluxa

translate_button_off_description.message: Batani ya Hundzuluxa a yi nge tikombi loko tsalwa ri hlawuriwile kambe wa ha swi kota ku hundzuluxela hi ku tikhoma xifaniso xa Pro Translate eka barhi ya switirhisiwa
